sentences.sContent: I drank a cup of champagne.
The champagne is spilling out of the bottle.
sentences.sContent_eng: The champagne is spilling out of the bottle.
sentences.sCn: 香槟从瓶子中不断地溢出来。

sentences.sContent: The champagne cork popped when he pulled it out.
sentences.sContent_eng: The champagne cork popped when he pulled it out.
sentences.sCn: 他拔香槟酒的瓶塞时它砰的一声开了。

phrases.pCn: 凹底很深的酒瓶；香槟酒瓶

trans.tranOther: a French white wine with a lot of  bubble s  , drunk on special occasions
